ctx: Twitter proti Musku: verjetnost, da bo direktor Tesle moral skleniti posel, se je z dodeljeno glavno sodnico povečala
content:
Vprašanje, kaj bo rekel Musk glede razkritij med pregledom podatkov
o poslovanju Twitterja. SEC sicer jamči, da so podatki in
informacije v celoti razkrite. Dogovor, običajno je to najprej
pismo o nameri (verjetno še ni bila sklenjena pogodba) pa ni
zavezujoče. Kar nekaj takšnih primerov pisem o namerah nakupov, ki
nato niso bili sklenjeni, je bilo tudi v Sloveniji. Lep dan.
author: bigl

ctx: Twitter proti Musku: verjetnost, da bo direktor Tesle moral skleniti posel, se je z dodeljeno glavno sodnico povečala
content:
kot zanimivost,

Last year, Delaware Chancery Court Judge Kathaleen McCormick, **
who experts expect will preside over the Twitter case **, oversaw a
court case featuring a private equity firm that tried to pull out
of an agreement to buy cake-decorating supply company DecoPac by
blaming the economic downturn brought on by the pandemic. McCormick
said the private equity firm acquiring DecoPac had to move forward,
even though they no longer had the original financing to complete
the deal.
author: crt
